title: I want to learn reading and writing Urdu. I do understand Urdu. What are some good online resources? - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest you to read newspapers in Urdu as they use a variety of words and meanwhile you will also know about the events in Pakistan. Some of these are: Akhbar-e-Jehan Daily Intekhab Daily Express Daily Jang While some Indian Newspapers are: Akhbar Urdu Daily Hindustan Express Sahafat Jadid Khabar
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Meer Hasham Ali

response.answer_text: Even I love Urdu and write poems in Urdu.  Best online source for this is: www.learningurdu.com best site with thousands of words with their meaning. It'll help you to a greater extent.
